pr_title: Print type parameters correctly for outer classes using -Ainfer=stubs

timeline.message: print type parameters correctly for outer classes

timeline.bodyText: I would test innermostTypeElt before using it; that is, transpose the two statements.
timeline.author: mernst
mernst

timeline.bodyText: Nit: I wouldn't use the special case.  This isn't speed-critical code, and a special case gives rise to the possibility of error or incompatibilities.  I think the general case works, so this is not necessary for correctness.
timeline.author: mernst

timeline.bodyText: It seems like classNames is only used for its length. This might be able to be changed to an int parameter.
timeline.author: jwaataja
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -472,6 +485,29 @@ private static int printClassDefinitions(
         return classNames.length;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Constructs an array of TypeElements corresponding to the list of classes.
+     *
+     * @param innermostTypeElt the innermost type element: either an inner class or an outer class
+     *     without any inner classes that should be printed
+     * @param classNames the names of the containing classes, from outer to inner
+     * @return an array of TypeElements whose entry at a given index represents the type named at
+     *     that index in {@code classNames}
+     */
+    private static TypeElement @SameLen("#2") [] getTypeElementsForClasses(
+            TypeElement innermostTypeElt, String[] classNames) {

replies.bodyText: We could, but I'd rather keep the array so that I can annotate the result as @SameLen, which expresses the actual contract.
replies.author: kelloggm

timeline.message: re-add my test case and actually make it pass :)
